pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a static shot from inside a greenhouse or polytunnel. Rows of large, leafy green plants, possibly a type of squash or pumpkin, are growing in tilled soil. Black drip irrigation lines run parallel to the plant rows, and wooden stakes support the large plants.
